pkgmetadata.longdescription: Martingale Dependence Tools and Testing for Mixture Cure Models // Computes martingale difference correlation (MDC), martingale difference divergence, and their partial extensions to assess conditional mean dependence. The methods are based on Shao and Zhang (2014) doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.887012. Additionally, introduces a novel hypothesis test for evaluating covariate effects on the cure rate in mixture cure models, using MDC- based statistics. The methodology is described in Monroy- Castillo et al. (2025, manuscript submitted).
